text: Danilo Mora (born 21 February 1961) is a Cuban rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1983 Pan American Games
title: Danilo Mora
